meanings.definition: Not included in the official list or accepted as standard
meanings.sent1: The noncanonical book was not part of the required reading list.
meanings.sent2: Her noncanonical approach to solving the problem surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The noncanonical way he tied his shoes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her noncanonical fashion sense was like a burst of color in a black-and-white world.
meanings.sent5: The noncanonical painting stood out among the traditional artwork.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to the rules or principles of a particular group or tradition
meanings.sent1: The noncanonical decision went against the usual protocol.
meanings.sent2: His noncanonical behavior at the ceremony raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent3: The noncanonical recipe for spaghetti involved adding chocolate sauce.
meanings.sent4: Her noncanonical interpretation of the play brought a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent5: The noncanonical dance moves were a mix of ballet and breakdancing.
